text:
e="preserve">Juan Valderrama Blanca (24 May 1916 – 12 April 2004), better known as Juanito Valderrama, was a Spanish flamenco and folk singer. Although he was known for singing copla. Valderrama was born in Torredelcampo, Spain. In 1960 he appeared in the "El emigrante".
Valderrama died on 12 April 2004 in Espartinas, Spain from cardiac arrest at the age of 87.
